name: CheckTemplate
description: Body of a Check referencing various Questions

columns.name: legacyTemplate
columns.description: Reference to an ExternalReference holding a legacy template outside of ONE Record; such as a photo or pdf of a checksheet

columns.name: usedInCheck
columns.description: Reference to the Check the template was used in

columns.name: questions
columns.description: References to all Questions that are part of this template

columns.name: checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: involvedParties
columns.description: Information about other Parties involved depending on the context of use

columns.name: date
columns.description: DateTime on which the CheckTemplate was released

columns.name: name
columns.description: Human-understandable name of object depending on the context

columns.name: skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object
